page.title: 17FILMING "REVOLUTION" (2)
page.content:
The dogs were supposed to follow the scent but something went wrong and they took the wrong route.After about ten minutes{Eddie Stacey}came and told us all about himself.He even showed us pictures out of his book. He showed us a picture of him doing a jump in a very old car,and the way to pull an horse to ground.He even told us about when he practiced so much for a stunt but in the end he could not do it because he was talking to someone and when he stepped back he fell over a lamp and damaged his leg for three months. Then we all got his autograph before we had to go home.
Scott Dann Age 10
